title: Storm Continues at Soudal Quick-Step in Wake of Mega-Merger: ‘A Lot of Damage and Little Result’
content:
Team chairman talks of discontent and future difficulty at Quick-Step after aborted merger with Jumbo-Visma.

Read the full article at Storm Continues at Soudal Quick-Step in Wake of Mega-Merger: ‘A Lot of Damage and Little Result’ on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
